api.apiTimeoutMessage: Interface request timed out, please refresh the page and try again!
api.apiRequestFailed: The request failed. Please try again later
api.errMsg405: Network request error, request method is not allowed!
api.errMsg503: Service unavailable, server temporarily overloaded or under maintenance!
api.errMsg505: http version does not support this request!
api.networkExceptionMsg: The network is abnormal, please check whether your network connection is normal!
api.errMsg401: User has no rights (wrong token, username, password)!
api.errMsg403: The user is authorized, but access is forbidden. !
api.errMsg404: Network request error, resource not found!
